p: The most widely used methods for prediction include linear regressions, logistic regressions, k-Nearest Neighbors ( k-NN) 1, support vector machines (SVM) 2, neural networks (NNs) 3, extreme learning machines (ELM) 4, deep learning (DL) 5, random forests (RF) 6 7, and generalized boosted models (GBM) 8 9.
